long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: This Chrome extension is in BETA. If you encounter any issues or have any feedback, please submit a new issue to Github (link in the extension's settings page). Suggestions are welcome!

----

Upwork Job Scraper + Webhook: Your Ultimate Job Hunt Assistant!

No more Upwork RSS Feed? No problem!

Looking for the perfect job on Upwork but tired of constantly refreshing the page? Say hello to the Upwork Job Scraper + Webhook, the Chrome extension that does all the heavy lifting for you! This nifty tool automatically scrapes job listings from Upwork and delivers them straight to your desired webhook URLâ€”think of it as your personal job-hunting sidekick.

Why You Need This Extension:

- Automated Job Hunting: With this extension, you can sit back, relax, and let the jobs come to you! It scrapes job listings from Upwork at regular intervals, so you never miss out on the latest opportunities.
- Customizable Settings: You decide how often the extension checks for new jobsâ€”daily, hourly, or even every few minutes. Plus, choose between "Most Recent Jobs" or your very own custom search URL for a personalized job feed.
- Seamless Webhook Integration: Get real-time job alerts sent directly to your favorite platform via webhook integration. Set it up once, and you're good to go!
- Push Notifications: Never miss a beat with optional browser notifications that keep you updated on new job postings.
- Easy to Use: With a user-friendly interface, configuring your settings and viewing scraped jobs is a breeze. Plus, you can manually trigger a job scrape whenever you want.
- Activity Logs: Keep track of what the extension is doing with detailed activity logsâ€”perfect for those who like to stay in the loop.

Why Wait?

Whether you're a freelancer looking for your next gig or a digital nomad wanting to keep your options open, the Upwork Job Scraper + Webhook is your new best friend. Download it today and make your job search smarter, not harder!
